question:
Simple present Tense (Nominal)    1.She .........my classmate *

A.was not

B.are not

C.is not

D.am not

2. ........... Brian our new neighbour? 

A.Is

B.Am

C.Was

D.Are

3. I ........ a teacher in SMAN-8

A.is

B.are

C.am

D.were

4. Arina and Firda............best dancers of this competition. 

A.are

B.is

C.was

D.am

5. ...................they the students of MTsN Barito Utara? 

A.Was

B.Am

C.Are

D.Is

6. Football ......... the most

favourite sport in earth. 

A.am

B.is

C.are

D.were

7. My brother and I......... actors for action movies. 

A.was

B.is

C.am

D.are

8............Mr. Bean so funny person ?

A.Is not

B.Are not

C.Am not

D.Were not​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1.C she is not

2.A.Is

3.C.Am

4.A.Are

5.C.Are

6.B.is

7.D.Are

8.A.Is not

Penjelasan:

I/YOU/THEY/WE :PAKAI ARE

HE/SHE/IT:PAKAI IS

Kalau lebih dari satu orang seperti no.7 pakai ARE

jika yg di tanyakan nama orang pakai IS

Jawaban:

1. C

2. A

3. C

4. A

5. C

6. B

7. D

8. A

Subject. To be

I. Am

You, We, They. Are

He, She, It. Is

Penjelasan:

Semoga membantu :D

related_questions.question:
The text is for no 3 - 5    I have a little sister. Her name is Salsa She is only a year old. She is cute. Salsa like a boy
because her hair is very short. She can walk but she can't speak. She likes walking around
the house
Salsa likes to play ball. Mother gave her a ball yesterday. The ball is soft Salsa likes to kick
the ball I love my sister very much. She has the best smile in the world
3. Who is Salsa
a. The writer's baby
b. The writer's little brother
c. The writer's little sister
d. The writer's little boy ​

Change these sentences into simple past tense, baseed on the given Marka in bracket! (number 1 to 3)    1. my family (go) to the cinema last week ( -, ? )

2. the student (study) in the laboratory yesterday ( +, - )

3. she (go) to Bandung two days ago (+, -)

4. the girl was very happy to hear the good news
 ( - ) .......

5. Active voice : the clever student brings a dictionary in his bag
 passive voice :.........​

answers.answer:
1. (-) my family did not go to the cinema last week.

(?) Did my family go to the cinema last week ?

2. (+) the student studied in the laboratory yesterday.

(-) the student did not study in the laboratory yesterday.

3. (+) she went to Bandung two days ago.

(-) she did not go to Bandung two days ago.

4. (-)

5. Passive voice: a dictionary is brought by student in his bag.

cmiiw
